overview:
As the Vice President of Business Development, Joseph Khoury drives TruePositionâ€™s corporate development and acquisition strategies, and manages partnerships and strategic alliances.

He brings more than 15 years of experience in the wireless and telecommunications industries. Prior to joining TruePosition, he was Vice President of Wireless Operations and Internet Services at Bell Mobility International where he was responsible for acquiring spectrum, overseeing the launch of new cellular carriers in emerging markets and driving revenue growth at various affiliate ISPs. Prior to Bell, he led Corporate Strategy at AT&T Canada and held several senior product marketing positions at Rogers Wireless where he launched several innovative wireless value added services.

Joseph holds an MBA from McGill University and a BS in Electrical Engineering.
